result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ryan LEE Nelson

defendant.name: Nelson, Ryan LEE
defendant.address: Hope Gospel Mission, 2110 Western Ave, Eau Claire, WI 54703

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on November 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Fax confirmation/amended bond/stip to Hope Gospel

Defendant is allowed contact with BMB, TLN, JJN, KLN except as prohibited by any restraining order or injunction involving the defendant and BMB, TLN, JJN and KLN. No contact with the residence. Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores or any other establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol. No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No controlled substances unless prescribed to defendant and then to be taken only as prescribed. If DE is discharged or leaves Hope Gospel Program he is to immediately return to jail.
Stipulation and Order to bond modification
Address changed per phone call from Ryan Nelson.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan LEE Nelson
Current: Hope Gospel Mission, 2110 Western Ave, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 08-26-2022)
Prior: 311 E Miner Ave, Rusk County Jail, Ladysmith, WI 54848 United States
Review hearing on November 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Any cash bond posted for Defendant shall be used for fines, costs and restitution pursuant to WI STAT 969.13(5).  No contact with BMB, TLN, JJN, KLN.  No contact with the residence.   Defendant is not to consume or possess alcohol.  Do not enter premises where alcohol is primary business, any bars taverns or liquor stores or any other establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.    No possession/consumption or use of illegal or illicit drugs, or any substance intended to use to alter mental state or mood.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  No possession of medications not prescribed to you by a physician.  If DE is discharged or leaves the Hope Gospel program he is to immediately return to jail.
Review hearing on November 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.

9:36 AM Defendant Ryan LEE Nelson appeared by video.  Attorney Wade Newell appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Ryan LEE Nelson. Time set for RH and Bond Hearing.  Atty Erdman addresses motion.  DE wishes to participate in programming at Hope Gospel, needs a sign bond to participate in the interview. The State is in the process of contacting the victim as to this matter, State does not have any objection to bond modification to allow Mr Nelson to participate in the interview and if accepted entering into the program. 

The court will order a $2500.00 sign bond that will go into effect July 27, 2022.  All conditions will remain.  If DE is discharged or leaves the program the $1000.00 cash bond will go back in effect and he is to immediately return to jail. Set for RH November 16, 2022 @ 11:30AM.
Bail/bond hearing on July 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Review hearing on July 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:45 AM Defendant Ryan LEE Nelson appeared by video from RC Jail.  Attorney Wade Newell appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Ryan LEE Nelson. Waive reading of the Information, enter a plea of NG. Set for RH July 25, 2022 @ 9:30am. Adj 10:47am.

ADDRESS INFO for Ryan LEE Nelson
Current: 311 E Miner Ave, Rusk County Jail, Ladysmith, WI 54848 United States  (Effective: 04-14-2022)
Prior: N702 Hwy 27, Conrath, WI 54731
Arraignment on May 17, 2022 at 10:30 am.

11:04 AM Defendant Ryan L Nelson in court with attorney Michelle M Erdman.  Defendant Ryan L Nelson in custody.  Wade Newell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L Nelson appeared by video means with Attorney.  DE has colloquy with DE on his right to personal appearance, DE understands, it is his preference to appear via ZOOM.  State calls Deputy Bryce Baier, oath given.  Direct by the State.  State offers Exhibit 1, received. Exhibit 1 will be confidential.  Cross by Atty Erdman. 11:11am Witness dismissed.  Court finds PC, will bind over for Trial.  State will file Information within 20 days.  Set for Arraignment May 17, 2022 @ 10:30 am. State will appear via ZOOM. Adj 11:14AM.
Exhibit 1, CONFIDENTIAL
Preliminary hearing on April 5, 2022 at 11:00 am.

01:56 PM Defendant Ryan L Nelson in court with attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow.  Defendant Ryan L Nelson in custody.  Wade Newell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L Nelson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Heard along with 21CF11, 22CF11.  22CF11-Adj Init App-DE appears in custody with PD Michelle Erdman.  Waive reading of the CC.  Set for PH April 5, 2022 @ 11:00AM.  Court instructs on waiver of TL for PH, DE is willing to waive TL for PH, court accepts waiver of TL.  

21CF11-Court has colloquy with DE on his right to personal appearance, DE will waive personal appearance.  State appears by SP Wade Newell.  DE appears with PD Dustin Rockow.  State requests 9 months jail time, CV judgment for unpaid court obligations, calculates 53 days credit.   Atty Rockow asks for 6 months jail on each count. Mr Nelson addresses the court, wishes to enter into a in treatment program when squared up.  The court will accept DOC recommendations, will order 9 months jail on Ct 1 and 90 days jail on Ct 2, CV JU, 53 days credit, huber. Adj 2:18pm
Adjourned initial appearance on March 8, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
01:49 PM Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court.  Emily Margaret Nelson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Special Prosecutor will be assigned, JA will contact parties and set a new date.
Adjourned initial appearance on February 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

01:39 PM Defendant Ryan L Nelson in court with attorney Michelle M Erdman.  Defendant Ryan L Nelson in custody.  Annette M Barna appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ryan L Nelson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Per DA Barna a special prosecutor will be assigned to this case. Adjourn to February 15, 2022 @ 1:00PM. Adj 1:40PM
